body_html:
My code there also throws a segfault at errG.backward(one) at line 250, but it worked on errD.backward() on line 210 & 224
https://gist.github.com/BarclayII/ffedd35326727b73bfafa7afff9722f4

They all worked when I rolled back my version to 0.1.10.post2.

body:
My code there also throws a segfault at `errG.backward(one)` at line 250, but it worked on `errD.backward()` on line 210 & 224
https://gist.github.com/BarclayII/ffedd35326727b73bfafa7afff9722f4

They all worked when I rolled back my version to 0.1.10.post2.
